00014 int last_id = 0;
00016 map<int,CascadeClassifier> obj_;
00017 
00025 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00026                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00027 {
00028     if (nrhs<1 || nlhs>1)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00030     
00031     // Determine argument format between (filename,...) or (id,method,...)
00032     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00033     int id = 0;
00034     string method;
00035     if (nrhs==1 && rhs[0].isChar()) {
00036         // Constructor is called. Allocate a new classifier from filename
00037         obj_[++last_id] = CascadeClassifier(rhs[0].toString());
00038         if (obj_[last_id].empty()) {
00039             obj_.erase(last_id);
00040             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid path or file specified");
00041         }
00042         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00043         return;
00044     }
00045     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00046         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00047         method = rhs[1].toString();
00048     }
00049     else
00050         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00051     
00052     // Big operation switch
00053     CascadeClassifier& obj = obj_[id];
00054     if (method == "delete") {
00055         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>0)
00056             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output argument not assigned");
00057         obj_.erase(id);
00058     }
00059     else if (method == "empty") {
00060         if (nrhs!=2)
00061             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00062         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.empty());
00063     }
00064     else if (method == "load") {
00065         if (nrhs!=3)
00066             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00067         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.load(rhs[2].toString()));
00068     }
00069     else if (method == "detectMultiScale") {
00070         if (nrhs<3 || (nrhs%2)!=1)
00071             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00072         
00073         // Option processing
00074         double scaleFactor=1.1;
00075         int minNeighbors=3, flags=0;
00076         Size minSize, maxSize;
00077         for (int i=3; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00078             string key = rhs[i].toString();
00079             if (key=="ScaleFactor")
00080                 scaleFactor = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00081             else if (key=="MinNeighbors")
00082                 minNeighbors = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00083             else if (key=="Flags")
00084                 flags = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00085             else if (key=="MinSize")
00086                 minSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00087             else if (key=="MaxSize")
00088                 maxSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00089             else
00090                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00091         }
00092         
00093         // Run
00094         Mat image(rhs[2].toMat());
00095         vector<Rect> objects;
00096         obj.detectMultiScale(image, objects, scaleFactor, minNeighbors, flags,
00097                              minSize, maxSize);
00098         plhs[0] = MxArray(objects);
00099     }
00100     else
00101         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00102 }
